title: Loving Hut - Qiaohuashijie - maybe closed
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for vegetarian living. Serving food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and more. Chinese Name: 爱家桥华世纪店 Chinese Address: 呼市桥华世纪村东影南路3号(小南国对面). NOTE: maybe closed/shut down, please verify and let HappyCow know.
